articles.title: Kim Young Sam fascist clique penalize students
Important guidelines for revolutionary parties, states
articles.content:
Kim Young Sam fascist clique penalize students
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean "civilian" fascist clique, at the puppet Seoul district court on Monday, staged a trial of students prosecuted for the inauguration of the fifth-term South Korean Federation of University Student Councils (Hanchongryon) and demanded prison terms ranging from two to five years for twelve students, according to a radio report from Seoul.
   The trial was the first for 289 students referred to trial and the fascist clique have decided to conduct a trial of some ten students almost every day to finish all the trials by the end of August, said the radio.
   In this way, the Kim Young Sam clique want to prevent activities of students and people which are likely to be conducted with the approach of the anniversary of National Liberation, August 15. But it is a foolish intention.

articles.title: Soldiers' meeting marking 70th anniversary of CPLA
articles.content:
Important guidelines for revolutionary parties, states
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Tela Nosi, National Chairman of the Labor Patriotic Party of Madagascar, released a statement on July 21 after reading Secretary Kim Jong Il's famous work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction".
   He said the work is run through with unfailing loyalty to President Kim Il Sung, ardent patriotism, strong spirit of independence and steadfast revolutionary principle.
   As Secretary Kim Jong Il said, preserving the Juche character and national character is essential for smashing the dominationist moves of the imperialists and the reactionaries and vigorously promoting the popular masses' cause of independence, the cause of socialism and is also vital to the prosperity and development of the country and the nation, he said.
   This work, he noted, has served as important guidelines to be taken by all the revolutionary parties and states.
   General Secretary of the National Democratic Congress of Ghana Huudu Yahaya met the Korean Ambassador to his country on July 12. He told the Ambassador that Secretary Kim Jong Il's theory and policy on maintaining the Juche character and national character in the revolution and construction are wealth more valuable than any other things and his another great feat for the time and history.

articles.title: Symposium on Secy. Kim Jong Il's work
articles.content:
Soldiers' meeting marking 70th anniversary of CPLA
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA)-- A soldiers' meeting was sponsored by the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces at the April 25 House of Culture on July 29 on the occasion of the 70th birth anniversary of the Chinese People's Liberation Army (CPLA).
   Present on invitation were Chinese Ambassador to Korea Wan Yongxiang, military attache of the Chinese Embassy Liu Jianhua and Embassy officials.
   Speaking at the meeting, Ri Yong Su, Vice-Minister of the People's Armed Forces, said that under the leadership of the Communist Party of China headed by the respected comrade Jiang Zemin the CPLA is firmly guaranteeing the socialist construction with Chinese characteristics by force of arms by waging a vigorous struggle to strengthen and develop the army into strong revolutionary armed forces fully prepared ideologically and politically and in military technique in the idea and principle of the leaders of the old generation in the army building.
    Under the wise leadership of Secretary Kim Jong Il, the officers and men of the Korean People's Army (KPA) will make all efforts to consolidate and develop generation after generation the precious Korea-China friendship established by President Kim Il Sung together with the leaders of the old generation of China, he added.
   Liu Jianhua said that under the leadership of the Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il the KPA has grown to be a revolutionary army remaining unfailingly loyal to the Party and the people and firmly defending the Korean-style socialism while effecting a new upswing in the combatant training and the construction of the major objects through the intensified political and ideological work.
   China, he noted, will in the future, too, fully support the reasonable proposition of the Korean Party and Government for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
   The Chinese people and CPLA value the Sino-Korean friendship much and will in the future, too, firmly unite, support and advance with the Korean people and KPA, he said.
   At the end of the meeting the participants saw a Chinese feature film.

articles.title: Kim Young Sam group's moves to obliterate "Hanchongryon" under fire
articles.content:
Symposium on Secy. Kim Jong Il's work
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- A symposium of the Linguistic Society of the DPRK took place at the academy of social sciences on Monday to deeply study the idea and theory indicated by Secretary Kim Jong Il in his famous work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction".
   It was said at the symposium that to preserve and apply the Juche character and national character in linguistics is a sacred cause to defend and exalt down through generations the undying feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and Secretary Kim Jong Il in this domain, and it is the fundamental principle which should be maintained constantly and the steadfast will and faith of the Workers' Party of Korea.
   The speakers stressed the need to thoroughly maintain the Juche character and national character in linguistics and keep alive the superiority of the Korean language to lay firm foundations for the unified development of the national language.

articles.title: Heinous threat against 14th WFYS
articles.content:
Kim Young Sam group's moves to obliterate "Hanchongryon" under fire
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Fatherland published information No. 743 on Tuesday denouncing the Kim Young Sam group's undisguised manoeuvres to suppress and obliterate the South Korean Federation of University Student Councils (Hanchongryon) with the approach of August 15.
   Some time ago, the puppet supreme public prosecutor's office announced that it would induce students to secede from "Hanchongryon" till the end of July and take a "legal action" against the students who do not withdraw from it on charges of "participating in the organisation benefiting the enemy" from August 1.
   This is a heinous move to make students secede from "Hanchongryon" with appeasement and at the point of the bayonet and block in advance massive events for reunification of students which are expected in south Korea with August 15 as an occasion, the information said.
   It continued:
   The Kim Young Sam group defined "Hanchongryon" as an "organisation benefiting the enemy" by invoking the "National Security Law" and threaten to accuse the students affiliated with it of "participating in the organisation benefiting the enemy."  This is a deliberate provocation to incite extreme hostility among the fellow countrymen and further aggravate the inter-Korean relations.
   We will never remain a passive onlooker to the Kim Young Sam traitorous clique's base moves to link "Hanchongryon" with us in a far-fetched manner and raise a whirlwind of frantic suppression of it and, thereby, divert elsewhere the attention of the people and bridge over the ruling crisis.

articles.title: Press review
articles.content:
Heinous threat against 14th WFYS 
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The "civilian"-veiled fascist clique of south Korea let the puppet prosecution authorities announce on July 29 that they would take a legal action against the members of the south Korean student delegation participating in the 14th World Festival of Youth and Students being held in Havana and the cadres of the South Korean Federation of University Student Councils (Hanchongryon) who dispatched the delegation on charges of violating the "National Security Law", accoring to a radio report from Seoul. 
   This is a heinous challenge to the festival of youth and students which is being held in the idea of anti-imperialist soldiarity, peace and friendship and an unpardonable fascist outrage against all the students in south Korea aspiring after independence, democracy and reunification.

articles.title: Cursed deed
articles.content:
Press review 
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today reports Secretary Kim Jong Il sent thanks to agitators in the countryside for setting an example in weeding.
   Given in the press are accounts of commemorative events held in different countries on the occasion of the third death anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
   Papers inform the readers that a symposium of the linguistic society on the famous work of Secretary Kim Jong Il "On preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" was held.
   Rodong Sinmun carries an editorial titled "women should become true revolutionaries loyal to Party's cause" and a political essay titled "we are proud of Korean women" on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of the promulgation of the law on equality of the sexes.
   Papers introduce the Korean women who vigorously push forward the revolution and construction.
   Papers carry news that the whole country and all the people are mobilised in the efforts to ease drought damage.
   Rodong Sinmun informs the readers that an opening ceremony for the Korean national club of the 14th World Festival of Youth and Students was held in Havana.
   Seen in the press are an account of a presidium meeting of the north headquarters of the National Alliance for the Country's Reunification (Pomminryon) and a statement released by the spokesman for the north headquarters of Pomminryon denouncing Kim Young Sam for crafty moves to disunite the movement for independence, democracy and reunification.
   Rodong Sinmun in a commentary denounces the Kim Young Sam group for working out a new operation to kill the South Korean Federation of University Student Councils (Hanchongryon) and prints an article on the moves for "reforming" the mass movement.
   Papers carry news that the statement of the spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK denouncing the United States for slandering the DPRK over the armed conflict on the Military Demarcation Line and the statement of the spokesman for the Panmunjom mission of the Korean People's Army on the puppets' grave military provocation against the north were distributed as official documents of the UN Security Council. 
   Seen in the press is news that the "civillian" fascist clique of south Korea declared they would prosecute the members of a delegation of the youth and students of south Korea to the 14th World Festival of Youth and Students and officials of "Hanchongryon" who dispatched them on charges of violating the "National Security Law".
   Papers convey news that a meeting of soldiers of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces was held to mark the 70th anniversary of the foundation of the Chinese People's Liberation Army.

articles.title: DPRK statements distributed as official documents of UN Security Council
articles.content:
Cursed deed 
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The Kim Young Sam group have worked out a new "operation to kill the South Korean Federation of University Student Councils (Hanchongryon)".
   It is proven by the puppet Ministry of Education's recent announcement that it will freeze "next year's financial aid" to universities and colleges refusing to withdraw from "Hanchongryon".
   Commenting on it, Rodong Sinmun today says:
   With this announcement the puppets of south Korea are seeking to force university authorities to put pressure upon their students to break with "Hanchongryon".
   This can be done only by Kim Young Sam group who do not hesitate to make education reactionary and mince the future of the nation in order to gratify their criminal intention for stifling "Hanchongryon".
   The entire nation will never pardon the fascist clique hellbent on the repressive moves against "Hanchongryon" which has taken the lead in the devoted efforts for independence, democracy and national reunification. The nation will make those involved in the "Ministry of Education's" fascist step pay for their crime.

articles.title: Kang Pan Sok, indomitable revolutionary fighter
articles.content:
DPRK statements distributed as official documents of UN Security Council 
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK published a statement on July 18 denouncing the united states for taking issue with the DPRK over the armed conflict along the Military Demarcation Line in the central sector of the front and the spokesman for the Panmunjom mission of the Korean People's Army a statement on July 18 as regards the south Korean puppet army's grave military provocation against the north. The statements were distributed as official document S/1997/566 of the UN Security Council on July 21.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Kim Young Sam group's moves to "reform" mass movement
articles.content:
Kang Pan Sok, indomitable revolutionary fighter 
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- An increasing number of Korean people are visiting the Chilgol Revolutionary Site.
   Chilgol is a time-honored place in which Kang Pan Sok, an indomitable revolutionary fighter, was born on April 21, 1892 and spent her childhood.
   In this place, President Kim Il Sung cultivated the great plan for national liberation in the period from spring 1923 to January 1925.
   Visitors went round the Revolutionary Site, looking back with deep emotion upon the brilliant revolutionary life of Kang Pan Sok.
   Under the guidance and help of the President, she formed the Anti-Japanese Women's Association, the First Communist Women's Political Organisation in Korea, in December 1926.
   The fighting aim of the association was to build socialism and communism in Korea in the future and, for the present, to defeat Japanese imperialism, liberate the country and achieve the socio-political emancipation of women.
   She conducted active revolutionary activities, taking it as vital to women's liberation movement to thoroughly apply the great Juche idea of the President in the women's movement as a whole.
   In 1928, she formed mass political organisations involving women from all walks of life.
   It was thanks to her energetic activities that middle-class women and women religionists as well as women of worker-peasant origin turned out in the sacred cause of liberating the country.
   She also carried out important tasks including the delivery of secret documents, art propaganda activities and carriage of weapons for the Saenal Juvenile Union and the Paeksan Youth Union formed by the President.
   When the President, together with 4-5 comrades, was closely encircled by the enemy, she carried weapons at the risk of her life.
   Indeed, her tireless efforts and undying exploits for the expansion and strengthening of the women's association and the revolutionary activities of the President will shine forever in the history of the country as an example of a great woman revolutionary.

articles.title: 51st anniversary of proclamation of law on sex equality marked
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Kim Young Sam group's moves to "reform" mass movement 
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The Kim Young Sam group of south Korea, upset by the daring struggle of the people for independence, democracy and reunification, are resorting to vicious and insidious moves to disintegrate the mass movement from within while intensifying the fascist crackdown upon it.
   Commenting on this fact, a news analyst of Rodong Sinmun today says:
   The Kim Young Sam group are trying to paralyse the fighting spirit of south Korean students and people and "reform" the student movement and the mass movement by means of making them "nonpolitical" and bringing them under "Government control".
   Their clamourings that the south Korean students and people must not fight for independence, democracy and reunification cannot be construed otherwise than a vicious artifice to denature the basic character of the mass movement and cut its lifeline.
   Now, the colonial dominationist forces and traitorous and separatist fascist forces in south Korea intend to "reform" the movement, disintegrate the forces fighting for independence, democracy and reunification and catch fish in troubled waters. This urgently requires all these forces to sharpen their vigilance and take a concerted action.
   The progressive activists and movement organisations in south Korea must heighten their vigilance against the ulterior motive of the fascist clique, frustrate all subversive activities and sabotages and thus prevent their ranks from being disorganised and strengthen the mass movement politically, ideologically and organisationally.
   The patriotic forces fighting for independence, democracy and reunification in south Korea must wage a joint mass struggle against outside forces' moves of domination, interference and pressure and frustrate the "civilian"- veiled dictatorial forces' treacherous, fascist, confrontation and separatist moves and develop the struggle into a united front.

articles.title: Korean national club opened in Havana
articles.content:
51st anniversary of proclamation of law on sex equality marked
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Today dedicates an editorial to the 51st anniversary of the proclamation of the law on sex equality by President Kim Il Sung on July 30, 1946.
   In the editorial titled "Women should become true revolutionaries loyal to the Party's cause", the paper says the proclamation of the law on sex equality was an epochal event of weighty significance in the Korean women's movement and the solution of women's problem.
   Under this law the Korean women could totally free themselves from the feudal oppression and humiliation of many years and create a new worthwhile life on an equal footing with men, it stresses.
   The editorial says:
   From the first days of his revolutionary activities, President Kim Il Sung clearly judged women's position and role in the revolution and construction and worked heart and soul to realize the social emancipation of women and train them to be active revolutionaries.
   Under his guidance, Kang Pan Sok, an indomitable revolutionary fighter, formed the Anti-Japanese Women's Association and led the Korean women to the road of independence. So, the proud history of the Korean women's movement could be started.
   The Korean women's movement has entered a new higher stage under the guidance of Secretary Kim Jong Il.
   His wise leadership is the main source whereby the Korean women have been well prepared to be revolutionaries unfailingly loyal to the Party and reliable workers rolling one of the two wheels of the revolution.
   Unbounded loyalty to the Party and the leader, spirit of devoted service to the country and the people, high sense of moral obligation, diligence and simplicity--these are proud characteristics of women in Korea who have been educated and trained under the warm care of the great leader and the great Party.
   Our entire women should continue their invariable advance along the road of revolution under the guidance of the Party, cherishing the expectation and trust of the Party, which has put forward them as flowers of the country and society and as pillars of the revolution and construction, and their noble mission before the times and the revolution, the editorial stresses.

articles.title: KEDO office opens
articles.content:
Korean national club opened in Havana
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The Korean national club of the 14th World Festival of Youth and Sudents was opened at the "Expo Cuba" hall in Havana on July 27.
   Displayed at the club were famous works of President Kim Il Sung and Secretary Kim Jong Il, books, photos and handiworks of Korea.
   At this fine club meetings, art performances and other events will take place to strengthen friendship and solidarity between the Korean youth and students and the progressive youth and students of the world.
   A performance of the Korean youth art troupe was given following speeches at the ceremony.

articles.title: Greetings to 7th Congress of Leftist Political Parties in Latin America and  Caribbean
articles.content:
KEDO office opens
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- A local office of the Korean Peninsula Energy Development Organization (KEDO) was set up in Kumho area Monday for the soon-to-be-started project for light-water reactors, which are to be supplied to the DPRK by the United States under the DPRK-U.S. agreed framework.
   The office will take charge of all the technical and practical affairs arising in the implementation of the LWR supply agreement and protocols in direct link with the DPRK department in charge of the LWR project.

articles.title: Drought persists in Korea
articles.content:
Greetings to 7th Congress of Leftist Political Parties in Latin America and  Caribbean
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea sent a message of greetings to the 7th Congress of the Leftist Political Parties in the Latin America and Caribbean region.
   The message expressed firm solidarity with the leftist political parties in their efforts to oppose the new liberalist policy of imperialists and strengthen regional cooperation, unity and solidarity for social justice, democracy and national independence.
   The message expressed the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the WPK and these parties would develop in the joint struggle for anti-imperialist independence and socialism, and wished the congress success in the discussion of  the joint action program against all imperialist acts of domination, subjugation and interference and for the independent development of the Latin American and Caribbean regional countries.

articles.title: Unity of pro-reunification forces in s. Korea called for
articles.content:
Drought persists in Korea 
Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- An unprecedented drought has continued in Korea.
   Over the past 50 days, there was a very little amount of rain in Pyongyang and South Phyongan Province and no rainfall in South and North Hamgyong provinces, Kangwon Province, areas south of Jongju, North Phyongan Province, and areas north of Hwangju, North Hwanghae Province.
   In Korea the rainy season usually begins on July 5. In the first twenty days of July, South and North Hamgyong Provinces would have 70-150 millimetres of rain and South Phyongan, North Hwanghae and Kangwon provinces 100-200 millimetres.
   Korea is characterized by little rain and drought in spring, a long spell of hot and humid weather and a large amount of rain and decreased sunlight in summer.
   The amount of rain in summer is 60-65 percent of a year's precipitation and in July and August, the rainy season, it is 50 percent of a year's rainfall.
   The existing drought has caused heavy damage not only in agriculture but in the nation's economy.

articles.title: Ri Jong Ok receives credentials from Iranian Ambassador
articles.content:
Unity of pro-reunification forces in s. Korea called for 
 Pyongyang, July 30 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the north headquarters of the National Alliance of Youth and Students for the Country's Reunification (Pomchonghakryon) issued a statement to the press today expressing the conviction that dissident organisations in south Korea will sharpen vigilance against the alienation moves of the Kim Young Sam fascist clique and grandly hold a reunification function of August 15 this year jointly with the south headquarters of the National Alliance for the Country's Reunification (Pomminryon) and "Hanchongryon".
   The spokesman said:
   The present south Korean regime has been driven into an abyss of ruin by the strong struggle of students and people for the prompt resignation of Kim Young Sam. at this very juncture, dissident organisations excluded from the August 15 function "Hanchongryon" and the south headquarters of Pomminryon, with which it had fought shoulder to shoulder, under the pretext of the suppression by the authorities while declaring that it would hold the August 15 function as a mass rally. This means retreat of the national democratic and reunification movement in south Korea.
   The exclusion of patriotic organisations from the August 15 function will only foster the division of pro-reunification forces as desired by the authorities and weaken them as a whole and, furthermore, help Kim Young Sam who is breathing the lasting breath isolated by the people.
